Name: Sleepy Smoker
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Smoked vodka delicately fortifies dry faintly salty manzanilla sherry with curaçao adding a touch of sweetness and zesty orange freshness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Amelia Castro at Polite Provisions, San Diego, CA, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Sleepy Smoker contains 139 calories
